des:
You can simply ask your Amazon Alexa to turn your smart products on and off through voice command. That’s not all, you can also ask your Amazon Alexa to dim your smart bulbs, change their color temperature, and change their color (if applicable);You can group items by room to control multiple devices at once, for example: “Alexa, turn on the dining room.”

To get started, pair your Globe Suite APP in the Amazon Alexa APP. To have Amazon Alexa control your devices, use the names you set up in the Globe Suite APP:
1. Download our "Globe Suite" app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in "Globe Suite" app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable "Globe Suite" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
5. Now all setup is finished.

Here are some examples:
Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.
Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.
Alexa, set the light to 50%.
Alexa, brighten the light to 50%.
Alexa, dim the light to 50%.
Alexa, set the light to green.
